meanings.definition: The quality of being audacious or bold.
meanings.sent1: Her audaciousnesses in challenging the status quo inspired others to be brave.
meanings.sent2: His audaciousnesses in proposing a new idea caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent3: The audaciousnesses of the squirrel stealing nuts from the bird feeder was both impressive and annoying.
meanings.sent4: The audaciousnesses of the waves crashing against the rocks reminded me of the power of nature.
meanings.sent5: The audaciousnesses of the lioness hunting her prey left us in awe of her courage.

meanings.definition: The act of being audacious or daring.
meanings.sent1: The audaciousnesses of his skydiving adventure amazed his friends.
meanings.sent2: She showed audaciousnesses by speaking up against injustice.
meanings.sent3: The audaciousnesses of the cat trying to catch a laser pointer dot provided endless entertainment.
meanings.sent4: His audaciousnesses on the dance floor made him the life of the party.
meanings.sent5: The audaciousnesses of the acrobat performing death-defying stunts left the audience breathless.
